nodes.text: The Qel-Droma Epics were stories which involved the Sith Lords Exar Kun and Naga Sadow, and the redeemed Jedi Knight Ulic Qel-Droma. Double-bladed lightsabers dated back to Kun and the Epics.

The Qel-Droma Epics were first mentioned in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying sourcebook Nexus of Power. The Epics primarily recount events depicted in the Legends comic book series Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi.
